stories.original_headline: The genetic advantage that helps some people stay sharp for life
stories.original_summary: A new study reveals that super agers over 80 have a distinct genetic edge. They are much less likely to carry the gene most associated with Alzheimer’s risk, even when compared with other healthy seniors. stories.fantasy_headline: Elder Sages Discover Secret to Lifelong Wisdom!
stories.fantasy_story: The Royal Alchemists have uncovered a wondrous secret among the oldest sages of the land. These wise ancients possess a unique bloodline gift, protecting their minds from the fading affliction that often befalls others. A special clarity charm within them grants them sharp wit and memory throughout their many years.

stories.original_headline: Why some people get bad colds and others don’t
stories.original_summary: Scientists found that nasal cells act as a first line of defense against the common cold, working together to block rhinovirus soon after infection. stories.fantasy_headline: Healers Uncover Body's Inner Wards Against Sniffle-Spells!
stories.fantasy_story: The Guild of Healers has discovered a secret within our very breath-ways. Tiny guardian spirits act as a first line of defense against the common sniffle-spell. A swift inner healing magic can banish the invisible imps before symptoms appear, keeping many villagers hearty and strong.

stories.fantasy_headline: Scrying Orb's Keepers Embrace Clumsy Mimicry Spirits!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Chroniclers' Guild, who manage the wondrous Scrying Orb, declared that its lesser enchantments are now a permanent fixture. These mischievous mimicry spirits often alter the town crier scrolls, sometimes making the public pronouncements quite peculiar, much to the dismay of the scribes. They seem to find it amusing.

stories.original_summary: Microsoft is giving its Paint and Notepad apps on Windows new AI capabilities for editing text and making digital illustrations. stories.fantasy_headline: Golem-Scribing Guild Unveils Enchanted Art Scrolls!
stories.fantasy_story: The Arch-Artificers' Clan has bestowed new lesser creation enchantments upon their famous enchanted easels and golem-quills. These tools, running on the Grand Operating Scroll, can now summon auto-drawing spirits to create wondrous, personalized enchanted scribbling books. This advanced magic brings joy to artists and scribes alike.
